Title.language: Doxology for the Feast of Circumcision

comment.language: For the Feast of the Circumcision:

text.language: APeno#c# I/#c# P,#c#: Ps/ri m~V] a~l/ywc: v/etaf[icarx qen ]paryenoc: acmici m~mof hwc a~gayoc.
Our Lord Jesus Christ: the true Son of God: who was incarnate of the Virgin: she gave birth to the Good One.

language.div: Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus: Putra Allah yang sejati: yang menjelma dari Sang Perawan: melahirkan Yang Mahabaik.

text.language: ربنا يسوع المسيح إبن الله الحقيقى الذى تجسد من العذراء ولدته كصالح.
Qen pimah s~m/n n~e~hoou: n~te pefjinmici m~paradoxon: afswp e~rof m~picebi: kata petecse m~pinomoc.
On the eighth day: of His wonderful birth: He accepted to Himself the circumcision: according to the custom of the law.

language.div: Pada hari kedelapan, / setelah kelahiran-Nya yang ajaib, / Dia menerima sunat bagi diri-Nya, / sesuai adat hukum Taurat.

text.language: فى اليوم الثامن لميلاده المجيد قبل إليه الختان كعادة الناموس.
Amwini n~tenouwst m~mof: je n~yof pe V] qen oumeym/i: n~ten]w~ou n~]paryenoc: y/e~tacj~ve cwmatikoc.
Come let us worship Him: for He is God in truth: let us glorify the Virgin: who bore Him in the Body.

language.div: Mari sembah Dia, / sebab Dia-lah Allah yang sejati, / mari muliakan Perawan, / yang mengandung-Nya dalam tubuh.

text.language: تعالوا لنسجد له لأنه الإله الحقيقى فلنمجد العذراء التى ولدته جسدياً.
Yel/l m~mwten m~voou: nieynoc t/rou qen ourasi: je P,#c# afswp e~rof: m~picebi e~h~r/i e~jwn.
Rejoice today: all you nations joyfully: for Christ accepted to Himself: the circumcision on our behalf.

language.div: Bersukacitalah hari ini: hai segala bangsa dengan gembira: sebab Kristus menerima bagi diri-Nya: sunat demi kita.

text.language: تهللوا اليوم بفرحٍ ياجميع الأمم لأن المسيح قبل إليه الختان عنا.
Hina n~tefaiten n~remhe: e~bolha p~cebi n~te ]carx: n~tef] nan m~pefp#n#a# e#y#u#: hiten pijwk e~bol.
That He may make us free: from the circumcision of the flesh: and grant us His Holy Spirit: in perfection.

language.div: Agar Dia membebaskan kita, / dari sunat daging, / dan menganugerahkan Roh Kudus-Nya bagi kita, / dalam kesempurnaan.

text.language: لكى يصيرنا أحراراً من ختان الجسد ولكى يعطينا روحه القدوس بالكمال.
Marou[isipi n~ce[isws: n~je niharacic t/rou etcwf: eucwtem m~Pauloc: je a~nok oucebi qen pimah s~m/n n~e~hoou.
Let all the defiled heresies: be put to shame and scorned: and let them hear Paul saying: “I am circumcised on the eighth day.”

language.div: Biarlah segala ajaran tercemar: dipermalukan dan dihina: dan biar mereka mendengar Paulus berkata: “Aku disunat di hari kedelapan.”

text.language: ليخزى وليفتضح كل الهراطقة الأنجاس وليسمعوا بولس قائلا أنا المختون فى اليوم الثامن.
Ef]m/ini nan e~jen P,#c#: je afswp e~rof m~picebi: qen pimah s~m/n n~e~hoou: kata v~nomoc m~Mwuc/c.
He told us about Christ: that He accepted to Himself the circumcision: on the eighth day: according to the Law of Moses.

language.div: Ia memberitahukan kepada kita tentang Kristus, / bahwa Dia menerima bagi diri-Nya sunat, / di hari kedelapan, / sesuai Hukum Musa.

text.language: ويدلنا على المسيح أنه قبل الختان قى اليوم الثامن كناموس موسى.
All/louia All/louia All/louia All/louia: I/#c# P,#c# Ps/ri m~Vnou]: afswp e~rof m~picebi.
Alleluia. Alleluia: Alleluia. Alleluia: Jesus Christ, the Son of God: accepted to Himself the circumcision.

language.div: Alleluia. Alleluia: Alleluia. Alleluia: Yesus Kristus, Putra Allah: menerima bagi diri-Nya sunat.

text.language: الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا يسوع المسيح إبن الله قبل إليه الختان.
